content:
<table-wrap id="tbl1" orientation="portrait" position="float">
<label>1</label>
<caption>
<title>Crystal Data and Structure Refinement Parameters for ARL-2</title>
</caption>
<oasis:table>
<oasis:tgroup align="left" cols="3">
<oasis:colspec colname="col1"></oasis:colspec>
<oasis:colspec colname="col2"></oasis:colspec>
<oasis:colspec colname="col3"></oasis:colspec>
<oasis:tbody>
<oasis:row>
<oasis:entry>empirical formula</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry nameend="col3" namest="col2">C<sub>10</sub>H<sub>10</sub>Cu<sub>3</sub>O<sub>10</sub>S<sub>2</sub>
</oasis:entry>
</oasis:row>
<oasis:row>
<oasis:entry>formula weight</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry nameend="col3" namest="col2">544.92</oasis:entry>
</oasis:row>
<oasis:row>
<oasis:entry>temperature</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry nameend="col3" namest="col2">150(2) K</oasis:entry>
</oasis:row>
<oasis:row>
<oasis:entry>wavelength</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry nameend="col3" namest="col2">0.77490 Å</oasis:entry>
</oasis:row>
<oasis:row>
<oasis:entry>crystal system</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry nameend="col3" namest="col2">monoclinic</oasis:entry>
</oasis:row>
<oasis:row>
<oasis:entry>space group</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry nameend="col3" namest="col2">
<italic toggle="yes">P</italic>2<sub>1</sub>/<italic toggle="yes">c</italic>
</oasis:entry>
</oasis:row>
<oasis:row>
<oasis:entry>unit cell dimensions</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry>
<italic toggle="yes">a</italic> = 13.549(5) Å</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry>α = 90°</oasis:entry>
</oasis:row>
<oasis:row>
<oasis:entry></oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry>
<italic toggle="yes">b</italic> = 5.503(2) Å</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry>β = 90.031(6)°</oasis:entry>
</oasis:row>
<oasis:row>
<oasis:entry></oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry>
<italic toggle="yes">c</italic> = 9.512(4) Å</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry>γ = 90°</oasis:entry>
</oasis:row>
<oasis:row>
<oasis:entry>volume</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry nameend="col3" namest="col2">709.2(5) Å<sup>3</sup>
</oasis:entry>
</oasis:row>
<oasis:row>
<oasis:entry>Z</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry nameend="col3" namest="col2">4</oasis:entry>
</oasis:row>
<oasis:row>
<oasis:entry>density (calculated)</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry nameend="col3" namest="col2">2.552 g·cm<sup>−3</sup>
</oasis:entry>
</oasis:row>
<oasis:row>
<oasis:entry>absorption coefficient (μ)</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry nameend="col3" namest="col2">6.088 mm<sup>−1</sup>
</oasis:entry>
</oasis:row>
<oasis:row>
<oasis:entry>
<italic toggle="yes">F</italic>(000)</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry nameend="col3" namest="col2">538</oasis:entry>
</oasis:row>
<oasis:row>
<oasis:entry>crystal size</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry nameend="col3" namest="col2">0.08 × 0.04 × 0.03 mm<sup>3</sup>
</oasis:entry>
</oasis:row>
<oasis:row>
<oasis:entry>ω range for data collection</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry nameend="col3" namest="col2">2.33−31.09°</oasis:entry>
</oasis:row>
<oasis:row>
<oasis:entry>index ranges</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry nameend="col3" namest="col2">−18 ≤ <italic toggle="yes">h</italic> ≤ 18, −7 ≤ <italic toggle="yes">k</italic> ≤ 7, −12 ≤ <italic toggle="yes">l</italic> ≤ 12</oasis:entry>
</oasis:row>
<oasis:row>
<oasis:entry>reflections collected</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry nameend="col3" namest="col2">9161</oasis:entry>
</oasis:row>
<oasis:row>
<oasis:entry>independent reflections</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry nameend="col3" namest="col2">1767 (<italic toggle="yes">R</italic>
<sub>int</sub> = 0.1269)</oasis:entry>
</oasis:row>
<oasis:row>
<oasis:entry>completeness to θ = 31.09°</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry nameend="col3" namest="col2">99.9%</oasis:entry>
</oasis:row>
<oasis:row>
<oasis:entry>absorption correction</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry nameend="col3" namest="col2">empirical</oasis:entry>
</oasis:row>
<oasis:row>
<oasis:entry>max. and min transmission</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry nameend="col3" namest="col2">0.8384 and 0.6416</oasis:entry>
</oasis:row>
<oasis:row>
<oasis:entry>refinement method</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry nameend="col3" namest="col2">full-matrix least-squares on <italic toggle="yes">F</italic>
<sup>2</sup>
</oasis:entry>
</oasis:row>
<oasis:row>
<oasis:entry>data/restraints/parameters</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry nameend="col3" namest="col2">1767/2/119</oasis:entry>
</oasis:row>
<oasis:row>
<oasis:entry>goodness-of-fit on <italic toggle="yes">F</italic>
<sup>2</sup>
</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry nameend="col3" namest="col2">0.777</oasis:entry>
</oasis:row>
<oasis:row>
<oasis:entry>final <italic toggle="yes">R</italic> indices [<italic toggle="yes">I</italic> > 2σ(<italic toggle="yes">I</italic>)]</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry nameend="col3" namest="col2">
<italic toggle="yes">R</italic>
<sub>1</sub> = 0.0355, <italic toggle="yes">wR</italic>
<sub>2</sub> = 0.0648</oasis:entry>
</oasis:row>
<oasis:row>
<oasis:entry>
<italic toggle="yes">R</italic> indices (all data)</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry nameend="col3" namest="col2">
<italic toggle="yes">R</italic>
<sub>1</sub> = 0.0604, <italic toggle="yes">wR</italic>
<sub>2</sub> = 0.0700</oasis:entry>
</oasis:row>
<oasis:row>
<oasis:entry>largest diff. peak and hole</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry nameend="col3" namest="col2">0.688 and −0.788 e<sup>−</sup>·Å<sup>−3</sup>
</oasis:entry>
</oasis:row>
</oasis:tbody>
</oasis:tgroup>
</oasis:table>
</table-wrap>
clean_text:
Table 1. Crystal Data and Structure Refinement Parameters for ARL-2

|                    |                    |                    |
|--------------------|--------------------|--------------------|
| empirical formula | C<sub>10</sub>H<sub>10</sub>Cu<sub>3</sub>O<sub>10</sub>S<sub>2</sub> |                    |
| formula weight     | 544.92             |                    |
| temperature        | 150(2) K           |                    |
| wavelength         | 0.77490 Å          |                    |
| crystal system     | monoclinic         |                    |
| space group        | P2<sub>1</sub>/c   |                    |
| unit cell dimensions | a = 13.549(5) Å   | α = 90°            |
|                    | b = 5.503(2) Å    | β = 90.031(6)°     |
|                    | c = 9.512(4) Å    | γ = 90°            |
| volume             | 709.2(5) Å<sup>3</sup> |                    |
| Z                  | 4                  |                    |
| density (calculated) | 2.552 g·cm<sup>−3</sup> |                    |
| absorption coefficient (μ) | 6.088 mm<sup>−1</sup> |                    |
| F(000)             | 538                |                    |
| crystal size       | 0.08 × 0.04 × 0.03 mm<sup>3</sup> |                    |
| ω range for data collection | 2.33−31.09° |                    |
| index ranges       | −18 ≤ h ≤ 18, −7 ≤ k ≤ 7, −12 ≤ l ≤ 12 |                    |
| reflections collected | 9161           |                    |
| independent reflections | 1767 (R<sub>int</sub> = 0.1269) |                    |
| completeness to θ = 31.09° | 99.9%       |                    |
| absorption correction | empirical     |                    |
| max. and min transmission | 0.8384 and 0.6416 |                    |
| refinement method  | full-matrix least-squares on F<sup>2</sup> |                    |
| data/restraints/parameters | 1767/2/119 |                    |
| goodness-of-fit on F<sup>2</sup> | 0.777 |                    |
| final R indices [I > 2σ(I)] | R<sub>1</sub> = 0.0355, wR<sub>2</sub> = 0.0648 |                    |
| R indices (all data) | R<sub>1</sub> = 0.0604, wR<sub>2</sub> = 0.0700 |                    |
| largest diff. peak and hole | 0.688 and −0.788 e−·Å<sup>−3</sup> |                    |
